title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When accessing the Project Properties Info page, the page displays text fields for the readonly fields (Path, Type, etc.)
EB: When accessing the Project Properties Info page, the readonly fields (Path, Type, etc.) should not be displayed as text fields.
SR: To reproduce the issue, 1. Select a Project. 2. Right-click and choose Properties. 3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as text fields.
